activities:
We may collect and process the following data about you: (i) Information about your use of our site including details of your visits such as pages viewed and the resources that you access. Such information includes traffic data, IP address data and other communication data; (ii) Information provided voluntarily by you. For example: when you register for a newsletter; and (iii) Information that you provide when you communicate with us by any means.

How we use website visitor information is very standard and does not contain any deep analytics.

recoursemech: ENFOS, Inc. has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus.  If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by ENFOS, Inc., please visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR website at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
